statements: DELETE FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE issuing_authority = 'Environmental Agency';
DELETE FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE permit_id = 100 AND compliance_status = 'Expired';
DELETE FROM waste_management_permits_and_licenses WHERE issuing_authority = 'Environmental Department' AND issue_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM waste_management_permits WHERE permit_id = 100 AND permit_type = 'Hazardous waste'
DELETE FROM waste_management_licenses WHERE license_id = 200 AND valid_from < '2023-01-01'
DELETE FROM waste_management_compliance WHERE compliance_id = 500 AND compliance_status = 'Pending';
